title: Zoomcar brings on board Flipkart's Adarsh Menon as president
description: In his new role, Adarsh Menon will be responsible for growth, operations, and customer experience at Zoomcar. Menon, who has more than 22 years of experience, joined the firm after an eight-and-a-half-year stint with Flipkart and a twelve-year stint with Hindustan Unilever.
